name: Craby Egg Care
description:
[In-Developement Game : Improvement soon ! ) ]

******

You are a blue crab in a desert island.

There are many eggs on your island.

Orange crabs want to eat eggs.

You have to PROTECT eggs in the sand castle.

The sand castle is under the orange arrow.

Save as many eggs as possible !

GOOD LUCK !

******

Controls : 

Keyboard : Arrow keys / WASD

GamePad : Joystick
